--- permalink: /records/khmom-scores/ layout: greystone title: Kingdom Hearts Melody of Memory Scores last_updated: May 8, 2023 at 1:32 PM ---

These are my current scores in the game Kingdom Hearts Melody of Memory for PlayStation. Each song has the score listed for the three difficulties along with the stage type next to the title. For the most part, the awkward capitialization and formatting of the titles has been perserved from the game.
